parts.text: Explain WPA to me

why did I get a loud alarm with a text message on my phone

Need to know if my new iPhone can receive emergency alerts from anywhere.
I bought a direct alert last month but it has never worked.
I didn't get any alert message this month but my husband did while we're both under the same Telus account. Do you know why?
There was a police alert in our area and my cell did not show it. Do you know why?
Can you please explain what Wireless Public Alerting is?
Getting this message about emergency alerts but I am not sure about what it is exactly. Could you please explain?
Just received an alert ready test. What's that?

What is Alert ready?

I no longer receive Public alert broadcast on my device.

It seems that I do not receive any public alerts on my device anymore

I think I missed a few of the government alerts, help me remedy that
